segments.text: Hello , Mr Trent . What can I do for you this afternoon ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Actually , Miao Ping , I'm here to close my account with you . I'm going home , the company is transferring me back to London .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I see . When are you leaving ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Next week , so I thought it was better to get this all sorted out as soon as possible .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , of course . Well , let's get started . Would you show me your passport , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here you are , Miao Ping . Don't laugh at the horrible photo today , OK ?
segments.speaker: S2
